welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kotelniki, Russia! Known for its beautiful parks, charming architecture, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer. Have a wonderful time discovering Kotelniki!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A new terminal for international flights, currently under construction.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Domodedovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal used for international flights, including those operated by major airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'DME Free WiFi' and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A new terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the 'Sheremetyevo WiFi' network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
